benchmark_details.name: FAIR-Compliant Dataset for Large Language Model Training
benchmark_details.overview: The study presents a framework that integrates FAIR principles into the lifecycle of Large Language Model (LLM) training, leading to the creation of a comprehensive dataset focused on detecting and mitigating biases.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To enhance the training of LLMs by embedding FAIR data principles into the training methodologies.

data.source: Sourced from diverse news feeds and websites between January and May 2023.
data.annotation: Annotated with a combination of automated methods (using GPT-3.5) and human reviews for quality assurance.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on classification performance across various tasks like toxicity detection and sentiment analysis.
methodology.interpretation: Higher metrics indicate better model performance in tasks.
methodology.validation: Models validated through dual-stage quality checks: automated and expert review.

targeted_risks.harm: Potential harm includes biased outputs leading to unfair representation of certain groups.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.data_licensing: Data licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International (CC BY-NC 4.0).
